channel.title: CVE Feed for VeronaLabs -- WP SMS

item.title: CVE-2023-32742|2023-08-30T11:08:09.174Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS plugin <=Â 6.1.4 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-34811|2024-06-06T19:14:12.390Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.5.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-30454|2024-03-29T16:30:14.635Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.6.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-25920|2024-03-27T05:45:44.417Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.3.4.
